Degree to which faith is free of doubt

Source: R/gss_vars_118.R
myfaith.Rd

myfaith

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question Here is another card with contrasting ideas. If you feel that "My faith is completely free of doubts," you would place yourself at 1. If you feel "My faith is mixed with doubts," you would place yourself at 7. If you feel somewhere between these two, you would place yourself at 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6. Where would you place your feelings about your faith… A. From Free of Doubt to Mixed with doubts

Values

  • [1] faith free of doubt

  • [7] faith mixed w doubt

  • [NA(d)] don't know [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook
